data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Keke, Xu, Xiang, Xiao, Yonghong, Yin, Haiqiang, Peng, Xianjin (2019): Six new species of Otacilia from southern China (Araneae: Phrurolithidae). Zootaxa 4585 (3): 438-458, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4585.3.2|18 occurrences
